permissions.name: Accounts
permissions.description: Managing accounts: creating new accounts, viewing and updating account information, deleting existing accounts

permissions.name: Contacts
permissions.description: Creating, viewing, editing and deleting user personal contacts

permissions.name: EditAccounts
permissions.description: Viewing and updating user account info (including name, business name, address and phone number/account number)

pathParameters.name: accountId
pathParameters.description: Internal identifier of a RingCentral account or tilde (~) to indicate the account logged-in within the current session

pathParameters.name: scaleSize
pathParameters.description: Dimensions of a profile image which will be returned in response

pathParameters.name: answeringRuleId
pathParameters.description: Internal identifier of an answering rule. The value can be standard digital ID or specific ID - either business-hours-rule or after-hours-rule

pathParameters.name: attachmentId
pathParameters.description: Internal identifier of a message attachment

properties.name: mainNumber
properties.description: Main phone number of the current account

properties.name: id
properties.description: Internal identifier of an asnwering rule

properties.name: uri
properties.description: Canonical URI to the answering rule resource

properties.name: versionString
properties.description: Version of the RingCentral REST API

properties.name: uriString
properties.description: URI part determining the current version
